snippet.title: Spicy and Creamy Mushroom Pasta Recipe in Tamil - No Cheese Recipe
snippet.description:
In this video, we will see how to make a Mushroom Pasta recipe in Tamil. This creamy and flavorful pasta dish is a perfect combination of tender mushrooms and al dente pasta, tossed in a rich and velvety sauce. It’s a comforting meal that’s easy to prepare and loved by both kids and adults! Whether you’re planning a quick weeknight dinner, a special weekend meal, this homemade mushroom pasta is a guaranteed crowd-pleaser. The earthy flavor of mushrooms, paired with the creamy sauce, makes it an irresistible recipe that you’ll want to make again and again. In this recipe, we are making a sauce from scratch and we are going to prepare this recipe without using cheese.
#pastarecipeintamil #homemadepastasauce #nocheesepasta

Friends, please do try this Mushroom Pasta recipe at home and share it with your loved ones. Don’t forget to share your feedback about the recipe in the comments below. All the best and happy cooking!

Ingredients:
2 tbsp Butter
2 tsp chopped Garlic
1/2 Onion
1 tsp Chilli powder
1/2 tsp pepper powder
2 large ripe Tomatoes(make puree)
1/2 tsp Sugar
1/4 cup sweet corn (optional)
250g Mushroom
salt as required 

For Cream:
2 tbsp Butter
1.5 tbsp Maida
2 cup Milk (500ml)
1 cup Pasta (then cook)
1/2 tsp dried basil leaves
salt as required
tags: how to make creamy mushroom pasta

snippet.title: Rasmalai Cake Recipe in Tamil | Eggless Rava Malai cake recipe in Tamil
snippet.description:
In this video, we will see how to make a Rasmalai Cake recipe in Tamil. This fusion dessert combines the rich, creamy flavors of traditional rasmalai with the soft, spongy texture of a cake, creating an irresistible treat that’s perfect for celebrations or special occasions. The delicious combination of saffron-infused milk, soft rasmalai pieces, and fluffy cake layers makes this dessert a showstopper that’s loved by everyone. Whether you’re looking for a unique birthday cake, a festive dessert, or simply want to try something new, this homemade Rasmalai Cake recipe is a guaranteed crowd-pleaser. Its beautiful presentation and delightful flavors make it a perfect choice for impressing your guests or indulging in something extraordinary at home.
#rasmalaicake #rasmalaicakerecipe #cakerecipewithoutegg 

Friends, please do try this Rasmalai Cake recipe at home and share it with your friends and family. Don’t forget to share your feedback about the recipe in the comments below. All the best and happy baking!


For the Rava Cake without Oven:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vWvMMiRREHA&t=199s

Ingredients: for Rava Cake without Eggs:
1/2 cup Curd
1/2 cup Oil
1/2 cup Sugar
1/2 cup Milk
3/4 cup fine Rava
1/4 cup Maida
1/2 tsp baking Soda
pinch of Salt
1/4 tsp Cardamom powder
Bake at 350F/175C for 23-25 min (8 inch square pan)

For the Milk:
1/2 cup condensed Milk
1/2 cup heavy cream
1.5 cup Milk
Saffron
1/4 cup chopped nuts

For cream topping:
1 cup whipping cream
Yellow food color
1/4 cup powdered Sugar

snippet.title: Chicken Bread Pockets Recipe in Tamil | Easy Chicken Snacks Recipe In Tamil
snippet.description:
In this video, we will see how to make Chicken Bread Pockets recipe in Tamil. These crispy and delicious snacks are perfect for any occasion! Filled with a flavorful chicken stuffing and wrapped in golden-brown bread, these pockets are a delightful treat that everyone will love. They’re easy to make, incredibly tasty, and perfect for tea-time, parties, or even as a quick evening snack. Whether you’re hosting a gathering, preparing snacks for your kids, or just craving something savory and satisfying, these homemade chicken bread pockets are the ultimate crowd-pleasers. The crispy outer layer combined with the juicy chicken filling creates a perfect balance of texture and flavor that’s impossible to resist.
#chickenrecipesintamil #chickenappetizer #appetizer 

Friends, please do try this Chicken Bread Pockets recipe at home and share it with your friends and family. Don’t forget to leave your feedback about the recipe in the comments below. All the best and happy cooking!


Ingredients:
For the Butter Chicken Filling:
2 tbsp Butter or Oil
250g boneless chicken
1/2 tsp chilli powder
Salt as required
2 tbsp Butter or Oil
1/2 onion
1 tsp ginger garlic
3/4 tsp chilli powder
1/2 tsp coriander powder
1/4 tsp garam masala
2 large tomatoes (pureed)
10 cashews soaked and ground with 1/2 cup water
salt as required
kasoori methi or coriander leaves
Bread slices
butter or Oil for frying

snippet.title: Chocolate Chip Cookies Recipe in Tamil
snippet.description:
In this video, we will see how to make Chocolate Chip Cookies recipe in Tamil. These classic cookies are the ultimate comfort food, loved for their soft, chewy texture and bursts of gooey chocolate in every bite. Made from scratch with the finest ingredients, these cookies are a guaranteed treat for both kids and adults. Whether you’re baking for a special occasion, looking for a quick snack, or simply indulging your sweet tooth, this homemade chocolate chip cookie recipe is perfect for every moment. The warm, buttery flavor combined with the rich chocolate chips makes these cookies an all-time favorite. Enjoy them fresh out of the oven with a glass of milk for a truly satisfying experience!
#chocolatechipcookies #cookiesrecipe #bakingrecipes 

Friends, please do try this Chocolate Chip Cookies recipe at home and share it with your loved ones. Don’t forget to share your feedback about the recipe in the comments below. All the best and happy baking!

Ingredients:
Makes 12 large chocolate chip cookies
100g unsalted butter (1/2 cup)
1/2 cup white sugar (100g)
1/2 cup brown Sugar (100g)
1 Egg
1 tsp vanilla extract
1.25 cup Maida (155g)
pinch of Salt
1/2 tsp baking soda
1/2 cup chocolate chips (75)
1/4 cup chopped Nuts (25g)
Bake at 350F /175C for 11-12 min

snippet.title: Chocolate Plum Cake Recipe in Tamil
snippet.description:
In this video, we will see how to make a Plum Cake recipe in Tamil. This rich and flavorful cake is a Christmas classic, filled with the goodness of dried fruits, nuts, and warm spices. Perfectly moist and aromatic, this traditional plum cake is a delightful treat for the festive season or any special occasion. Whether you’re preparing for Christmas celebrations, looking for a unique dessert, or simply want to enjoy a slice of nostalgia, this homemade plum cake recipe is sure to impress. The combination of caramelized sugar, soaked fruits, and a hint of spice creates a deep, indulgent flavor that’s hard to resist.
#plumcake #plumcakerecipe #christmascake 

Friends, please do try this Plum Cake recipe at home and share it with your friends and family. Don’t forget to share your feedback about the recipe in the comments below. All the best and happy baking!


Ingredients:
1 cup black raisins (150g)
3/4 cup Water
1/4 cup Butter (50g)
3 large eggs
1/2 cup Milk
1/2 cup Oil
1 tbsp vanilla extract
1.5 cup Maida (170g)
1/4 cup cocoa powder (20g)
1 tsp baking powder
1/2 tsp baking soda
1/4 tsp Salt
Bake at 350 F/ 175 C for 55 in  (7*4 inch pan)

For Cream:
1 cup whipping cream
2 cup chocolate(300g)
1/2 cup powdered Sugar(100g)

For Pine cone:
1/4 cup condensed Milk (50g)
1/3 cup Chocolate (50g)
sliced almonds

snippet.title: Deluxe Carrot Semiya Sweet Recipe in Tamil
snippet.description:
In this video, we will see how to make Carrot Semiya recipe in Tamil. This simple and delicious dish combines the goodness of carrots with the versatility of semiya (vermicelli) to create a flavorful and wholesome sweet recipe. Whether served as evening snack, dessert, or as an appetizer, this recipe is packed with nutrition and taste, making it perfect for all age groups! The natural sweetness of carrots paired with the smooth khoya creates a delightful balance of flavors that’s hard to resist. This easy-to-make dish is ideal for preparing a sweet recipe in no time. 
#carrotsemiya #carrothalwa #carrotsweetrecipe 

Friends, please do try this healthy Carrot Semiya recipe at home and share it with your friends and family. Don’t forget to share your feedback about the recipe in the comments below. All the best and happy cooking!

Ingredients:
For making Khoya:
1 tbsp Ghee
2 tbsp Milk
1/2 cup Milk powder (50g)

For Deluxe Carrot Semiya Sweet:
1 tsp Ghee
1 cup Semiya
2 tbsp Ghee
1/2 cup grated Carrot
2.25 cup Water
1 cup Sugar
pinch of Salt
Orange food color (optional)
2 tbsp Ghee
chopped Nuts
Cardamom powder

snippet.title: Soft Rava Wheat Appam Recipe in Tamil | Godhumai Rava Paniyaram Recipe in Tamil
snippet.description:
In this video, we will see how to make Rava Paniyaram (Appam) Sweet recipe in Tamil. This delicious and easy-to-make dessert is perfect for festive occasions or as a quick snack to satisfy your sweet cravings. Made with the goodness of rava (semolina) and infused with the right balance of sweetness, these soft and fluffy paniyarams are an all-time favorite in many South Indian households. Whether you’re hosting a festival celebration, looking for a unique tea-time treat, or simply want to try something new, this sweet Rava Paniyaram recipe is sure to impress your family and friends. The crispy golden crust and soft, melt-in-your-mouth center make these paniyarams truly irresistible.
#ravapaniyaram #ravaappam #paniyaramrecipeintamil 

Friends, please do try this Rava Paniyaram Sweet recipe at home and share it with your loved ones. Don’t forget to leave your feedback about the recipe in the comments below. All the best and happy cooking!

Ingredients:
Makes12-15 soft Rava Appam
1/2 cup rava
3/4 cup Wheat flour or Maida
1 cup Jaggery
1 Banana
1 cup Coconut Milk
Cardamom powder
pinch of Salt
2 pinch Baking soda
Water if required

snippet.title: Meen Pollichathu Recipe in Tamil
snippet.description:
In this video, we will see how to make Meen Polichathu recipe in Tamil. This traditional and flavorful dish is a true delight for seafood lovers! Made with fresh fish marinated in aromatic spices and wrapped in banana leaves, Meen Polichathu is a signature recipe from Kerala that’s packed with rich, smoky flavors and a melt-in-your-mouth texture.

Whether you’re looking for an authentic seafood dish to impress your family or planning a special dinner with South Indian flavors, this Meen Polichathu is a perfect choice. The combination of tender fish, perfectly blended masalas, and the natural aroma of banana leaves creates a dish that is both healthy and irresistibly delicious.
#MeenPolichathu #FishRecipeInTamil #KeralaFishRecipe 

Friends, please do try this traditional Meen Polichathu recipe at home and share it with your friends and family. Don’t forget to leave your feedback about the recipe in the comments below. All the best and happy cooking!


Ingredients:
for 1 large Fish
1/4 tsp Turmeric
1 tsp Chilli powder (or as required)
1/4 tsp Coriander powder
1/2 tsp pepper
Salt as required
Water
Oil for frying

For Masala:
2-3 tbsp Coconut Oil
1/4 tsp Mustard seeds
2 Onion
1 tbsp Ginger Garlic
1 Green Chilli
Curry leaves
1/4 tsp Turmeric powder
1 tsp Coriander powder
1-1.5 tsp Chilli powder
1 large Tomato
required Salt
1/2 cup thick Coconut Milk

Banana Leaves for wrapping
Oil for frying
chopped Onion, coriander leaves, Lemon juice for garnishing
tags: meen pollichathu kerala style in tamil
fish fry in banana leaf recipe

snippet.title: Afghan Bolani Recipe in Tamil | Lunchbox Potato Recipe in Tamil
snippet.description:
In this video, we will see how to make Afghan Bolani recipe at home. Bolani is a popular Afghan stuffed flatbread that is crispy on the outside and filled with delicious savory goodness on the inside. Traditionally stuffed with spiced potatoes, green onions, or even spinach, this Afghan street food is perfect as an appetizer, snack, or light meal. Whether you’re hosting a gathering, looking for a unique dish to try, or simply want to explore new flavors, this homemade Bolani recipe is a guaranteed crowd-pleaser. The combination of the soft, flavorful filling and the golden, crispy outer layer makes it an irresistible treat for both kids and adults.
#AfghanBolani #BolaniRecipe #AfghanStreetFood

Friends, please do try this Afghan Bolani recipe at home and share it with your friends and family. Don’t forget to share your feedback about the recipe in the comments below. All the best and happy cooking!

 

Ingredients:
Makes 8 Bolani
1 cup wheat  flour
1 cup Maida
2 tbsp Oil
1 tsp Salt or as required
Water as required

For the potato stuffing
1 tbsp Oil
1 tsp chopped Ginger
1 tsp chopped Garlic
1 green chilli
1 tsp Cumin seeds
1 Onion
1 tsp Coriander powder
3/4-1 tsp chilli powder
4 medium potatoes boiled and mashed
handful coriander leaves
handful spring Onion
Salt as required 
Water if needed
Oil for frying

snippet.title: Pepper Chicken Gravy Recipe in Tamil
snippet.description:
In this video, we will see how to make Pepper Chicken Gravy recipe in Tamil. This spicy and flavorful chicken curry is a must-try for anyone who loves bold South Indian flavors! Made with freshly ground black pepper, aromatic curry leaves, and a blend of spices, this pepper chicken curry delivers a rich, thick gravy with the perfect balance of heat and flavor.

Whether you’re preparing a hearty dinner for your family, looking for a dish to pair with rice, chapati, or dosa, or simply craving something spicy and comforting, this homemade pepper chicken gravy is sure to impress. The warm, peppery taste combined with the rich masala makes it a favorite for both spice lovers and those exploring South Indian cuisine.
#pepperchickenrecipe #pepperchickencurry 

Friends, please do try this South Indian Pepper Chicken Gravy at home and share it with your friends and family. Don’t forget to leave your feedback about the recipe in the comments below. All the best and happy cooking!

Ingredients:
For Pepper Chicken Masala:
2 tbsp pepper corns
1 tsp Coriander seeds
1 tsp Fennel seeds
1 tsp Cumin seeds
2 small Cinnamon
2 cloves
2 cardamom
2 red Chillies

For pepper Chicken Gravy
4 tbsp oil
2 small Cinnamon
2 cloves
2 cardamom
2 large Onion
1 tbsp Ginger garlic paste
Curry leaves
1 Tomato
1/8 tsp Turmeric powder
Salt as required
Water as required
5-6 Cashews (soaked in Water)
few Coriander leaves

snippet.title: Butterscotch Pudding Recipe in Tamil
snippet.description:
In this video we will see how to make Butterscotch Pudding recipe in Tamil. This Butterscotch pudding is the ultimate comfort food, perfect for satisfying your sweet tooth! Made from scratch with a luscious blend of caramelized sugar, butter, and creamy milk, this dessert offers a deep, indulgent flavor that’s hard to resist. Whether you're planning a dinner party, looking for a quick weeknight treat, or simply want to try something new, this homemade butterscotch pudding is a guaranteed crowd-pleaser. The smooth, silky texture combined with the rich, buttery caramel taste makes it an all-time favorite for both kids and adults.
#butterscotchpudding #puddingrecipeintamil #sweetrecipeintamil 

Friends, please do try this butterscotch pudding recipe at home and share it with your friends and family. Also, please do share your feedback about the recipe in the comments below. All the best and happy cooking!

Ingredients:
2 cup Milk(500ml)
1/4 cup Sugar (50g)
1/2 cup Sugar (100g)
4 tbsp Butter (60g)
3 Eggs
pinch of Salt
1 tsp Vanilla extract or Cardamom powder
Steam for 25-30 min on medium

snippet.title: Thattai Recipe in Tamil | How to Make Crispy Thattai | Traditional South Indian Snack Recipe
snippet.description:
In this video we will see how to make Thattai Recipe at home in Tamil. Thattai is a classic South Indian snack that is popular during festivals like Krishna Jayanthi and Diwali. Known for its crunchy texture and savory flavor, Thattai is a timeless treat made with a blend of rice flour, spices, and aromatic seasonings. In this video, we will see the easy step-by-step process to make perfectly round, golden-brown thattais that are crispy on the outside and packed with deliciousness inside. Perfect for festivals, family gatherings, or even as an everyday snack, Thattai is incredibly versatile and satisfying. Serve it as a tea-time treat or store it in an airtight container for a crunchy snack whenever the craving strikes.
#thattairecipeintamil #thattai #snackrecipeintamil 

Ingredients:
makes 45-50 small sized thattai
For grinding:
1 tsp cumin seeds
4-5 Garlic
curry leaves
5 red chillies (soaked)

For making thattai maavu:
2 cup roasted rice flour (idiyappam flour)
1/4 cup pottu kadalai maavu (roasted gram flour)
2 pinches of Asafoetida
1 tbsp Butter or hot Oil
2 tbsp soaked channa dal
1 tsp salt or as required
Water as required

snippet.title: Blondie Recipe in Tamil | How to make Perfect Blondies at home in Tamil
snippet.description:
In this video we will see how to make blondie recipe in tamil. Blondies are the perfect dessert for those who love a rich, chewy treat but want something different from the classic brownie. This delightful dessert bar has the same dense, fudgy texture that you crave in a brownie but with its own unique, buttery, caramel-like flavor. Unlike traditional brownies that rely on cocoa powder or melted chocolate, blondies are all about the deep flavors of vanilla and brown sugar. 
#blondie #blondierecipe #bakingrecipes 

Friends, please do try this blondie recipe at home and share it with your friends and family. Also, please do share your feedback about the recipe in the comments below. All the best and happy cooking!

Ingredients: 
1 cup melted butter (200g)
1.25 cup packed brown sugar  (250g)
2 large Eggs
1 tsp vanilla extract
1+3/4 cup Maida (220g)
1/4 tsp Salt
1/2 tsp Baking powder (optional)
3/4 cup Chocolate chips(100g) (or Nuts )

Bake at 350F/175C for 23-24 min (8 inch square pan)

snippet.title: Crispy Banana Roll Recipe in Tamil | Philippines Snack Recipe | Turon Recipe in Tamil
snippet.description:
In this video we will see how to make a crispy banana roll recipe in Tamil. This Turon recipe is a popular snack in the Philippines and is basically a banana and jackfruit rolled inside a springroll sheet with a sugar syrup glazed over it. But instead of the traditional filling, we can also make a sweet coconut filling as well. These crispy banana sweets make a perfect evening snack.
#turon #eveningsnacksrecipe #crispybanana

Friends, please do try this crispy banana roll recipe at home and share it with your friends and family. Also, please do share your feedback about the recipe in the comments below. All the best and happy cooking!

Ingredients:
For the Spring Roll sheet: (makes 8-10 sheets)
2 cup Maida
1/2 tsp Salt
Hot water as required 

Turon filling:
Banana slices 
Jackfruit pieces
Sugar

For the Coconut stuffing:
1/2 cup Coconut
1/4 cup Sugar
1/4 tsp Cardamom powder

For the outer sugar coating
4 tbsp Sugar
2 tbsp Water

snippet.title: Semiya Adai Recipe in Tamil  | Quick & Healthy South Indian Breakfast | How to Make Vermicelli Adai
snippet.description:
In this video we will see how to make Semiya Adai, a tasty and unique variation of the classic South Indian adai that’s perfect for breakfast or an evening snack. In this recipe we will be creating a crispy, golden Vermicelli Adai packed with flavor and nutrition. Combining the traditional essence of adai with the light, delicate texture of vermicelli, this dish is a must-try for anyone looking for a simple and healthy meal idea. Semiya Adai is not only quick to prepare but also kid-friendly and ideal for busy mornings or family snacks. It brings a delightful twist to regular breakfast options and ensures a filling, wholesome experience. This delicious recipe can be served with your favorite chutney or sambar.
#semiyaadai #vermicelliadai #breakfastrecipesintamil 

Friends, please do try this semiya adai recipe at home and share it with your friends and family. Also, please do share your feedback about the recipe in the comments below. All the best and happy cooking!

Ingredients:
Makes 6 Semiya Adai
1 cup roasted Semiya
1 tbsp Oil
1/4 tsp Mustard seeds
1/2 tsp Cumin seeds
1 Onion
1 green Chilli
1 tsp chopped ginger
Curry leaves
1 tbsp crushed peanuts  (optional)
1 grated Carrot
1/4 cup grated Coconut
required Salt
6 tbsp chickpea flour (or as required)
Oil or Ghee as required

snippet.title: Chicken Donne Biryani Recipe in Tamil | தொன்னை பிரியாணி
snippet.description:
In this video we will see how to make Chicken Donne Biryani Recipe in Tamil. Unlike the regular biryani, Chicken Donne Biryani is a specialty from Karnataka, India, known for its earthy, aromatic notes and distinctive presentation in a “donne” (traditional leaf bowl). This special biryani recipe stands out for its use of whole spices, fresh herbs like mint and coriander, and a green masala base that gives it a one-of-a-kind color and fragrance. From the perfectly spiced marinated chicken to the subtle smoky flavor, this recipe captures everything that makes Donne Biryani so beloved. This biryani differs from traditional versions and creates an authentic South Indian flavor experience right in your kitchen!
#donnebiryani #donnebiryanirecipe #biryanirecipeintamil 

Friends, please do try this chicken donnai biryani recipe at home and share it with your friends and family. Also, please do share your feedback about the recipe in the comments below. All the best and happy cooking!

Ingredients:
serves 5-6 :
1 tbsp Oil
1.5 tbsp chopped Ginger (20g)
1.5 tbsp chopped garlic (20g)
12 small onion
5 green chillies
5 Cashews
handful Mint leaves
handful Coriander leaves
1/4 cup Curd
1/2 cup Water
For the chicken Donne Biryani:
4 tbsp Oil
3-4 tbsp Ghee
2 Bay leaves
4 small Cinnamon
5 Cardamom
5 cloves
1 star anise
1 small mace
1 stone flower
1/2 tsp fennel seeds
2 Onion (200g)
750g Chicken
1/4 tsp Turmeric powder
1.5 tsp Biryani masala (or garam masala)
1 tsp Coriander powder
1.5 tsp Chilli powder
Salt as required (1 tbsp)
1/2 Tomato
3 cup Water
2 cup Seeraga samba Rice
1/2 tsp lemon juice
tags: how to make donne biryani at home

snippet.description:
In this video we will see how to make Pottukadalai Murukku, a crispy and tasty snack that's perfect for any occasion. This easy-to-follow recipe uses roasted gram flour (pottukadalai), rice flour, and a few simple ingredients to create a crunchy and flavorful treat you can enjoy with tea or as a festive snack. These murukkus always remind me of all the festival snacks exchanged between neighbors during the Diwali season. 
#murukkurecipe #pottukadalaimurukku #crispymurukku

3/4 tsp Sesame seeds

snippet.title: Rava Laddu Recipe in Tamil | Rava Ladoo | Diwali Sweet Recipes in Tamil
snippet.description:
Rava laddu, a popular Indian sweet made from semolina (rava or suji), is often prepared during festivals like Diwali, Ganesh Chaturthi, and Navratri. This traditional delicacy is known for its melt-in-the-mouth texture and rich flavors, combining roasted semolina with ghee, sugar, and cardamom. Garnished with raisins and cashews, Rava laddu holds a special place in festive celebrations, symbolizing sweetness, joy, and togetherness. Its simplicity in preparation and delightful taste make it a must-have on festive occasions, where families come together to share and enjoy this beloved treat.
#ravaladdu #ravaladoo #diwalisweetsrecipesintamil 

Friends, please do try this rava laddu recipe at home and share it with your friends and family. Also, please do share your feedback about the recipe in the comments below. All the best and happy cooking!

Ingredients:
Makes 12-14 Rava Ladoo:
1 cup Sugar
seeds of 4-5 Cardamom
1 tbsp Ghee
7 Cashews + 7 Almonds +  2 tbsp raisins
3 tbsp Ghee
1 cup Rava
1/2 cup Coconut
1/2 cup Milk

snippet.title: Paasi Paruppu Laddu Recipe in Tamil | No oil-No fry-Melt in mouth | Moong Dal Ladoo Recipe in Tamil
snippet.description:
In this video we will see how to make paasi paruppu laddu recipe in tamil. This is a refined version of the traditional South Indian sweet, delivering a melt-in-your-mouth sensation without using oil or frying. Made with roasted moong dal (paasi paruppu), sugar, and a hint of cardamom, this laddu is both light and flavorful. The moong dal is roasted to a golden color, ground to a coarse powder, and blended with sugar for a perfectly sweet balance. Ghee is the only fat added, ensuring a soft texture and a rich taste. This healthier, no-fry recipe makes for a quick, delicious treat, ideal for festivals or as an energy-boosting snack.

Ingredients:
Makes 15 motichoor style Paasi Paruppu ladoo:
1 tsp Ghee
1 cup Moong dal (200g)
3 cup Water
1 cup Sugar (200g)
pinch of Salt
Cardamom powder
4 tbsp Ghee
4 tbsp Nuts
tags: pasi paruppu laddu recipes in tamil

The moong dal is roasted to a golden color, ground to a coarse powder, and blended with sugar for a perfectly sweet balance. Ghee is the only fat added, ensuring a soft texture and a rich taste. This healthier, no-fry recipe makes for a quick, delicious treat, ideal for festivals or as an energy-boosting snack.

Ingredients:
Makes 15 motichoor style Paasi Paruppu ladoo:
1 tsp Ghee
1 cup Moong dal (200g)
3 cup Water
1 cup Sugar (200g)
pinch of Salt
Cardamom powder
4 tbsp Ghee
4 tbsp Nuts

snippet.title: Brownie recipe in Tamil | Chewy Fudgy Brownie Recipe in Tamil
snippet.description:
In this video we will see how to make brownie recipe in tamil. There are two types of brownies, cakey brownie which is dry and flaky and fudgy brownie which is softer and more chewy. Both brownies are different in their ratios of flour to fat content. For this recipe, we can use either chocolate bars or chocolate morsels. Also, in this recipe we have used egg but we can make an eggless version by substituting eggs with curd/yogurt.
#brownie #brownierecipeintamil #brownierecipe 

Friends, please do try this brownie recipe at home and share it with your friends and family. Also, please do share your feedback about the recipe in the comments below. All the best and happy cooking!

Ingredients:
150g semi sweet chocolate or dark chocolate
50g Nuts or chocolate
1/2 cup Butter (100g)
3 Eggs
1.5 cup Sugar (300g)
1/4 cup Oil
1 tsp Vanilla extract
1 cup Maida (125 g)
1/2 cup cocoa powder (40g)
1/8 tsp Salt
8 inch square baking pan 175c/350f for 28 min

snippet.title: Thattai Jamun Recipe in Tamil | Diwali Sweet Recipe in Tamil
snippet.description:
In this video we will see how to make cream jamun recipe in tamil. In this recipe we are going to make some flat jamuns using maida and rava and then make a sweet cream for flavoring the jamun. It is then garnished with nuts. Since we are making flat / thattai jamuns there is a lot of crispy surface of the jamun which soaks up the sugar syrup and the flavorful cream.
#flatjamun #creamjamun #diwalisweets 

Friends, please do try this flat jamun recipe at home and share it with your friends and family during this festival season. Also, please do share your feedback about the recipe in the comments below. All the best and happy cooking!

Ingredients:
Makes 10 Flat creamy Jamun sweet:
For the cream:
3 cup Milk (750 ml)
3-4 tbsp Sugar
pinch of Cardamom

For the Flat Jamun:
1 tbsp Ghee
2 tbsp Curd
1/4 cup Rava
3/4 cup Maida
pinch of Salt
2 pinch Baking Soda
Milk as required (little more than 1/4 cup)
Oil for frying

For the Sugar syrup:
1 cup Sugar
1 cup Water
3 Cardamom
Saffron (optional)

In this video we will see how to make Ice halwa recipe in tamil. This authentic Indian dessert, known for its thin, melt-in-your-mouth texture, is perfect for festive occasions like Diwali or for satisfying your sweet tooth. 3/4 cup Sugar

food color (optional)

Cardamom powder

snippet.title: Paneer Stuffed Taco style Chapathi with Instant Paneer Recipe in Tamil
snippet.description:
In this video we will see how to make paneer stuffed chapathi recipe in tamil. This is a style similar to quesadilla or a stuffed taco but using a wheat chapathi instead of corn tortilla. Also, in this recipe we are going to be using homemade instant paneer. This is a quick and easy dinner recipe which can be made in no time and is absolutely delicious.

Ingredients:
Makes 5-6 Taco Chapathi:
4 cup Milk (1 liter)
3 tbsp Lemon juice
2 tbsp Oil
1/4 tsp Mustard seeds
1/2 tsp Cumin seeds
2 medium Onion
1 Green Chilli
Curry leaves
1/2 tsp Garam masala
1/2 tsp Coriander powder
3/4 tsp Chilli powder
1 small Tomato
required Salt
Coriander leaves
5-6 leftover chapathi 
if using readymade Paneer use 150g - 200g

snippet.title: Seeni Paniyaram Recipe in Tamil | Chettinad Seeni Paniyaram Recipe in Tamil
snippet.description:
In this video, we will see how to make the delicious Chettinad Seeni Paniyaram, a traditional sweet treat from the heart of Tamil Nadu's Chettinad cuisine. This crispy, golden-brown fried dessert is made with flour, jaggery, and cardamom. Perfect for festive occasions or as a quick snack, this easy-to-make recipe is a delightful blend of sweet and aromatic flavors.

Friends, please do try this seeni paniyaram recipe at home and share it with your friends and family. Also, please do share your feedback about the recipe in the comments below. All the best and happy cooking!

Ingredients:
Makes 12 Vellai Paniyaram
1 cup Raw rice
1 tbsp skinless black gram
3/4 cup Sugar
1/2 cup coconut
3 Cardamom
pinch of Salt
pinch of baking soda
2 tbsp Water (or as required)

snippet.title: Mushroom Donne Biryani Recipe in Tamil | தொன்னை பிரியாணி | Bangalore Special Biryani Recipe in Tamil
snippet.description:
In this video we will see how to make Donne biryani recipe in tamil. This is a veg donne biryani version made with mushrooms. Donne biryani is made using fresh masala paste and is very flavorful. It is traditionally served in a small bowl made with palm leaves. Also, for donne biryani we have to use seeraga samba rice which adds more flavor to the recipe.
#donnebiryani #donnebiryanirecipe #mushroombiryani 

Friends, please do try this donne biryani recipe at home and share it with your friends and family. Also, please do share your feedback about the recipe in the comments below. All the best and happy cooking!


Ingredients:
serves 5-6 :
2 tbsp Oil
15 small onion
5 green chillies
5 Cashews
handful Mint leaves
handful Coriander leaves
4 tbsp Oil
2 tbsp Ghee
2 Bay leaves
4 small Cinnamon
5 Cardamom
5 cloves
1 star anise
1 small mace
1 stone flower
1/2 tsp fennel seeds
2 Onion (200g)
2 tbsp Ginger Garlic paste
350g Mushroom (300-400g)
1/4 tsp Turmeric powder
1 tsp Biryani masala (or garam masala)
1 tsp Coriander powder
1 tsp Chilli powder
Salt as required (1 tbsp)
1/4 tsp Curd
1/2 Tomato
3 cup Water
2 cup Seeraga samba Rice
2 tbsp Ghee

snippet.title: Sweet Poori Recipe in Tamil | Makhmal Recipe in Tamil
snippet.description:
In this video we will see how to make sweet poori recipe in tamil. The sweet poori is filled with a filling made from pottu kadalai and is coated with a mild sugar syrup. These pooris are super soft and filled with flavor. This sweet recipe can be during festival and is a huge hit with everyone.

2-3 Cardamom

3/4 cup Sugar
3/4 cup Water
3 Cardamom

snippet.title: Kalmas Recipe in Tamil | Spicy Tea Time Snacks Recipe in Tamil
snippet.description:
In this video we will see how to make kalmas recipe in tamil. This is a spicy evening snacks recipe which can be served along with tea / coffee. This recipe is popular in the state of Kerala and this is a fusion between egg bonda and egg puff. After frying, the outer layer get a little cripsy and is filled with flavor. The inner egg and stuffing resembles the traditional egg puff. This recipe is definitely worth the try and is a very different taste than the regular mutta bonda.
#kalmasrecipe #eggrecipesintamil #eveningsnacksrecipe 

Friends, please do try this kalmas recipe at home and share it with your friends and family. Also, please do share your feedback about the recipe in the comments below. All the best and happy cooking!

Ingredients:
Makes 8 Kalmas:
For the Stuffing:
2 tbsp Oil
2 Onion
2 tsp Ginger Garlic
2 Green Chillies
Curry leaves
1/4 tsp Turmeric powder
1/2 tsp Coriander powder
1/2 tsp Garam masala
1/2-3/4 tsp Chilli powder
2 boiled Eggs (8 pieces)
Salt as required

For the Outer layer:
1/4 cup coconut
1/2 tsp Cumin seeds
1 small Onion
1 cup Rice flour (i have used Idiyappam flour)
boiling Water
Salt as required
steam for 10 min

For extra seasoning:
1/8 tsp Turmeric powder
1/2-1 tsp Chilli powder
little Salt 
Water
2 tbsp Oil

1.5 tbsp Ghee

snippet.title: Bubble Bun Recipe in Tamil | Soft and Fluffy Pull-apart Buns in Pressure Cooker in Tamil
snippet.description:
In this video we will see how to make bubble bun recipe in tamil. In this recipe we are going to make soft and fluffy pull-apart mini buns which can be topped with a variety of toppings. Also, these buns can be used dipping into hot soups and stews. They can also be served as a fun evening snacks recipe.
#bubblebun #bubblebunrecipe #minibun

Friends, please do try this buble bun recipe at home and share it with your friends and family. Also, please do share your feedback about the recipe in the comments below. All the best and happy cooking!

Ingredients:
Makes 31-32 bubbles:
1/2 cup Warm Milk 
1/2 tsp Sugar
1 tsp yeast (3g)
2 cup Maida (250g)
1.5 tbsp Sugar
3/4 tsp Salt
3 tbsp Milk
3 tbsp softened Butter

For the topping:
2 tbsp Melted Butter
2 Green Chillies
Coriander leaves
pinch of Salt
Cheese (optional)

Bake at 175c / 350 F for 20-22 min
Cooker at medium heat for 28 min

snippet.title: Vinayagar Chathurthi Pillayarpatti Modagam Recipe in Tamil
snippet.description:
In this video we will see how to make modagam recipe in tamil. This modagam recipe is a large kozhukattai which is made from pacharisi, moong dal, coconut and jaggery. This sweet recipe is popular during the vinayagar chathurthi festival. This sweet recipe is very quick and easy to make and these kolukattai are very tasty.
#modagamrecipe #kozhukkattai #kollukattai 

Friends please do try this modagam kozhukattai recipe at home and share it with your friends and family. Also, please do share your feedback about the recipe in the comments below. All the best and happy cooking!

Ingredients:
Makes 12 large Kozhukattai:

snippet.title: Bakery Style Chicken Cutlet Recipe in Tamil
snippet.description:
In this video we will see how to make chicken cutlet recipe in tamil. This is a quick and easy to make chicken starter / appetizer and is a classic recipe. In making the chicken cutlet, the chicken is minced and mixed with the seasonings which makes them soak up the flavor and the coating with breadcrumbs creates a crispy texture on the outside. The slow panfrying helps in generating the crust and makes is crispy. 
#chickencutlet #cutletrecipe 

Friends, please do try this chicken cutlet recipe at home and share it with your friends and family. Also, please do share your feedback about the recipe in the comments below. All the best and happy cooking!

Ingredients:
Makes 8-10 Bakery Style Chicken Cutlet
250g boneless Chicken
1/4 tsp Turmeric powder
1/2 tsp Pepper powder
required Salt
required Water
2 tbsp Chickpea flour 
2 tbsp Oil
1 Onion
1 tbsp crushed Ginger Garlic
1 Green Chilli
Curry leaves
1 tsp Chicken masala (or Garam masala)
1 tsp Coriander powder
1.5 tsp Chilli powder
1/2 tsp Pepper powder
required Salt
1 large Potato(cooked)
Coriander leaves
1 egg
Salt and Pepper
1/2 cup bread crumbs
4 tbsp Oil for frying

snippet.title: Thirupagam Recipe in Tamil | Kadalai Maavu Halwa Recipe in Tamil
snippet.description:
In this video we will see how to make Thirupagam recipe in tamil. This sweet recipe is served during festivals and during wedding ceremonies. This sweet recipe is made from kadalai maave (chickpea flour) and cashew nut powder. The addition of cashew nut powder adds a nice nutty flavor to the recipe but it can be replaced with other nuts as well. Adding a pinch of salt at the end elevates the recipe and cardamom powder is used to improve the flavoring.
#thirupagam #kadalaimaavuhalwa 

Friends, please do try this thirupagam recipe at home and share it with your friends and family. Also, please do share your feedback about the recipe in the comments below. All the best and happy cooking!

Ingredients:
For making Kadalai maavu Halwa:
1 cup Chickpea flour (kadalai maavu)
2 cup Milk
1.5 cup Sugar
1 cup Cashew nut powder
3/4 cup + little extra Ghee
Cardamom powder

snippet.title: Javvarisi Vadai Recipe in Tamil | Sabudana Vada Recipe in Tamil | ஜவ்வரிசி வடை
snippet.description:
In this we will see how to make Javvarisi vadai recipe in Tamil. This crispy vada can be made in no time without any long batter fermentation process. The javvarisi / sago / tapioca pearls offers a nice interesting texture to the vada. This sabudana vada is a great evening snack and is very different from the common medu vadai and paruppu vadai and this vada can also add variety when served along with pongal or idli. 
#javvarisivadai #sabudanavada #vadarecipe 

Friends, please do try this javvarisi vadai recipe at home and share it with your friends and family. Also, please do share your feedback about the recipe in the comments below. All the best and happy cooking!

Ingredients: 
Makes 8-10 Javvarisi Vadai
1/2 cup Sago (Tapioca pearls) / Javvarisi
1 boiled Potato
1/4 cup roasted peanuts (crushed)
2 tbsp Onion
Coriander leaves
curry leaves
chopped Ginger
1 green chilli
1/2 tsp Cumin seeds
1/2 tsp Chilli powder
1-2 tbsp Chickpea flour
required Salt

snippet.title: Paneer Rava Dosa Recipe in Tamil | Instant Rava Paneer Dosa Recipe in Tamil | Ready in Minutes
snippet.description:
In this video we will see how to make instant rava dosa recipe in tamil. This instant rava dosa is ready in minutes and can be enjoyed with any masala of our preference. When the paneer masala is cooked and caramelized on the iron tawa pan it is absolutely delicious. This paneer dosa can be a good addition to the breakfast routine because it can be made instantly and the batter doesn't need fermentation like the regular dosa.
#instantdosa #ravadosa #paneerdosa 

Friends, please do try this instant rava dosa recipe at home and share it with your friends and family. Also, please do share your feedback about the recipe in the comments below. All the best and happy cooking!

Ingredients:
Makes 10 Rava Dosa
1 cup Rava
1/2 cup phoa (flattened rice)
2 tbsp Rice flour
1/2 cup Curd
Water as required
1/2 tsp Salt
1/2 tsp Baking soda

For the Paneer Masala:
2 tbsp Oil
1/4 tsp Mustard seeds
1 large Onion
1 tsp Ginger Garlic paste
1 green chilli
Curry leaves
1/4 tsp Turmeric powder
1/2 tsp Garam masala
1/2 tsp Coriander powder
3/4 tsp Chilli powder
1 large Tomato
150-200g Paneer
chopped Coriander leaves
Salt as required
Oil as required

snippet.title: Muttai Mittai Recipe in Tamil | Egg Sweet Recipe in Tamil
snippet.description:
In this video we will see how to make muttai mittai recipe in tamil. This egg sweet is a very popular sweet recipe which can be made with a handful of ingredients. The original recipe for Syed Muttai mittai uses Khoya but if Khoya is not available we can stir and evaporate 1 litre of milk to make about 200g of khoya. This egg sweet has a melt in mouth soft texture and smooth finish to it and is definitely a wonderful recipe to make during the holidays.
#eggsweet #muttaimittai

Friends, please do try this egg sweet recipe at home and share it with your friends and family. Also, please do share your feedback about the recipe in the comments below. All the best and happy cooking!

200g unsweetened Khoya (or 1 liter full fat milk to make khoya)
6 Eggs
1/4 cup Ghee (50g)
1/2 tsp fresh Cardamom powder
1 cup Sugar (200g)
Bake at 160C / 320F for 35-40 min

snippet.title: ABC Powder Recipe in Tamil | ABC Malt Recipe in Tamil
snippet.description:
In this video we will see how to make ABC malt recipe at home in tamil. ABC malt powder can be made by dehydrating apple, beetroot and carrot. We can then grind them into a fine powder and when we are making the juice, it can be sweetened by jaggery. When drying them under the sun, the more moisture removed, the longer the shelf life.
#abcjuice #abcmaltrecipe

Friends, please do try this ABC juice recipe at home and share it with your friends and family. Also, please do share your feedback about the recipe in the comments below, All the best and happy cooking!



Ingredients:
200g Apple
200g Beetroot
200g Carrot 
10 Almonds
10 Cashews
4 Cardamom
Jaggery as required

snippet.title: Coconut Macaroon Recipe in Tamil
snippet.description:
In this video we will see how to make coconut macaroons recipe at home. In this recipe we are going to whip up egg whites and sugar to make stiff peaks and then add in some dessicated coconut and then baking the macaroons. The added coconut brings some texture and additional sweetness to the recipe. These cookies are very easy to make and extremely delicious. The macaroons might seem little soft when they are fresh out of the oven but will firm up and crisp after 2-3 hours.
#macaroons #coconutmacaroons 

Friends, please do try this coconut macaroons recipe at home and share it with your friends and family. Also, please do share your feedback about the recipe in the comments below. All the best and happy cooking!

Ingredients: Makes 25 medium sized Coconut Macaroons
2 large egg whites
6 tbsp Sugar(1/3 cup / 75 g)
1/2 cup desiccated coconut
Bake at 100 C / 215 F for 75 min
turn off the oven and let it sit for 2-3 hrs
tags: how to make coconut macaroon in tamil
how to make macaroons at home

snippet.title: Stuffed Paneer Chilli Recipe in Tamil | Crispy Milagai Bajji Recipe in Tamil
snippet.description:
In this video we will see how to make stuffed chilli recipe in tamil. In this recipe we are going to stuff some paneer and potato into a bajji milagai (banana pepper) and then coat the outer surface with bread crumbs and fry it. This method of frying creates a crispy crust which is very flavorful. We can also replace the paneer/ potato stuffing with our favorite combinations. The crispy coating of bread crumbs and mildly spicy chilli and the caramelized taste after frying is truly delicious.
#chillibajji #stuffedbajji #stuffedchilli

Friends, please do try this cripsy milagai bajji recipe at home and share it with your friends and family. Also, please do share your feedback about the recipe in the comments below. All the best and happy cooking!


Ingredients:
1 cup grated paneer (125g)
½ cup mashed potato (1 medium potato)
½ Onion
Coriander leaves
½ tsp Garam masala
½ tsp Cumin powder
½ tsp Chilli powder
Required Salt
½ cup Maida
Pinch of Salt
1/8 tsp Pepper powder
Water as required
1 cup bread crumbs

snippet.title: White Chicken Biryani Recipe in Tamil | வெள்ளை பிரியாணி | Vellai Biryani
snippet.description:
In this video we will see how to make white chicken biryani recipe in tamil. White biryani or Vellai biryani which uses subtle amounts of spice and makes a flavorful but mild biryani. 2 tbsp Ginger Garlic green chilli paste
handful Mint leaves
handful Coriander leaves
3 -4 Green Chillies

3/4 tsp Coriander powder
3/4 tsp Pepper powder

1/2 tsp brown sugar or Jaggery on each Kuzhi
Pineapple chunks

snippet.title: Sweet Potato Fries Recipe in Tamil
snippet.description:
In this recipe we will see how to make sweet potato fries recipe at home. In this recipe we are going to make thin strips of sweet potato and then season it with some chilli powder and salt. A small amount of corn flour is also added to ensure that the salt and chilli powder cling on to the sweet potato. When frying the sweet potato, we have to make sure that the oil temperature is moderate, if the oil is too hot, the sweet potatoes will be burnt from the outside and if the temperature is too low, they soak up a lot of oil.
#sweetpotatorecipes #sweetpotatofries #sweetpotatochips

Friends, please do try this sweet potato recipe at home and share it with your friends and family. Also, please do share your feedback about the recipe in the comments below. All the best and happy cooking!

Ingredients:
3 large sweet potato (650g approx)
4-5 tbsp Corn flour
1 tsp Chilli powder
required Salt
Oil for frying

snippet.title: Aloo Bhujia Recipe in Tamil | Potato Bhujia Recipe in Tamil | Haldiram's Aloo Bhujia Recipe
snippet.description:
In this video we will see how to make aloo bhujia recipe at home in tamil. This potato bhujia is a crispy evening snack which is perfect for muching. In this recipe we make thick dough by mixing mashed potatoes  with chickpea flour and season them spices and fry them in oil as a big omapodi and then season the bhujia with chat masala powder.
#aloobhujiarecipe #potatobhujia #snacksrecipesintamil 

Friends, please do try this aloo bhujia recipe at home and share it with your friends and family. Also, please do share your feedback about the recipe in the comments below. All the best and happy cooking!

Ingredients:
2 Potatoes (200g) (3/4 cup mashed)
1 cup Chickpea flour (1-2 tbsp more if required)
1/4 tsp Turmeric powder
1/4 tsp Garam masala powder
1/4 tsp Cumin powder
1/4 tsp Coriander powder
1/2 tsp Chilli powder
1/4 tsp dry Mango powder(or lemon juice)
1/4 tsp Mint powder
1/2 tsp Salt or as required
1/4 tsp Chat masala(or as required)
tags: how to make aloo bhujia recipe in tamil
